headline.print_headline: Beckham's Miami Stadium Plan Hits Stormy Waters
headline.main: Beckham's Miami Stadium Plan Hits Stormy Waters

docs.snippet: David Beckham's dream of building a futuristic waterfront  stadium in Miami that would house his own professional soccer team has turned into a "not in my backyard" clash, pitting the retired English superstar against one of the world's top cruise...
docs.lead_paragraph: David Beckham's dream of building a futuristic waterfront  stadium in Miami that would house his own professional soccer team has turned into a "not in my backyard" clash, pitting the retired English superstar against one of the world's top cruise lines.

headline.print_headline: PSV Clinch Europa League Place, Champions Ajax Held
headline.main: PSV Clinch Europa League Place, Champions Ajax Held

docs.snippet: PSV Eindhoven made sure of European club competition next season with a 2-0 win over NAC Breda while Ajax Amsterdam closed their Dutch championship-winning season with a draw on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: PSV Eindhoven made sure of European club competition next season with a 2-0 win over NAC Breda while Ajax Amsterdam closed their Dutch championship-winning season with a draw on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Soccer-Bristol Rovers Leave Football League After 94 Years
headline.main: Soccer-Bristol Rovers Leave Football League After 94 Years

docs.snippet: Angry fans clashed with police after Bristol Rovers lost their Football League status for the first time in 94 years on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Angry fans clashed with police after Bristol Rovers lost their Football League status for the first time in 94 years on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Martino Future Uncertain After Latest Barca Failure
headline.main: Martino Future Uncertain After Latest Barca Failure

docs.snippet: The future of Barcelona coach Gerardo Martino was uncertain on Saturday after a 2-2 home draw with lowly Getafe all but ended the club's bid for a fifth La Liga title in six years....
docs.lead_paragraph: The future of Barcelona coach Gerardo Martino was uncertain on Saturday after a 2-2 home draw with lowly Getafe all but ended the club's bid for a fifth La Liga title in six years.

headline.main: Winning Day in Kentucky for California Chrome

docs.snippet: The jockey Victor Espinoza rode the favorite to a convincing victory on Saturday in the 140th Kentucky Derby at Churchill Downs....
docs.lead_paragraph: The jockey Victor Espinoza rode the favorite to a convincing victory on Saturday in the 140th Kentucky Derby at Churchill Downs.

headline.print_headline: Gaborik Leads Kings to 3-2 OT Win vs Ducks
headline.main: Gaborik Leads Kings to 3-2 OT Win vs Ducks

docs.snippet: After waiting 20 years to meet in the playoffs, the Los Angeles Kings and Anaheim Ducks provided an overtime thriller in the opening tussle for Southern California supremacy....
docs.lead_paragraph: After waiting 20 years to meet in the playoffs, the Los Angeles Kings and Anaheim Ducks provided an overtime thriller in the opening tussle for Southern California supremacy.

docs.snippet: Dee Gordon was a headache for the Miami Marlins for 11 innings at the plate, on the bases and in the field. Carl Crawford came off the bench to make his impact with a single swing....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dee Gordon was a headache for the Miami Marlins for 11 innings at the plate, on the bases and in the field. Carl Crawford came off the bench to make his impact with a single swing.

headline.print_headline: Portland Fire Officials Respond to 6 Fires
headline.main: Portland Fire Officials Respond to 6 Fires

docs.snippet: Portland fire officials say they've responded to half a dozen fires set by an unknown suspect in the same neighborhood....

headline.print_headline: Indiana Health Officials: MERS Patient Improving
headline.main: Indiana Health Officials: MERS Patient Improving

docs.snippet: A man hospitalized in Indiana with the first U.S. case of a mysterious virus that has sickened hundreds in the Middle East is improving, state health officials said Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A man hospitalized in Indiana with the first U.S. case of a mysterious virus that has sickened hundreds in the Middle East is improving, state health officials said Saturday.
